medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began approximately 12 hours prior to admission, with nausea, vomiting, and abdominal pain reported. No aggravating or relieving factors specified.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Bells palsy 3 weeks ago, depression, history of nasal septum surgery. No history of hypertension or asthma.
medical_history.family_history: Denies bleeding/clotting disorders, no recurrent miscarriages, no history of congenital disorders.
